messages.messageBody:
Hey, Rue! That was just the ticket!!! Thanks! Now, my son can have a
*proper* multicolored tail.

Marji

>Hope it's helpful! ~Rue

>Marji

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Help!!  Need Knitting Mushroom Instructions!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Marji - I m not sure if this is what you mean by mushroom, but here are some instructions for spool knitting (or corking):
messages.messageBody:
Hi Marji - I'm not sure if this is what you mean by mushroom, but here
are some instructions for spool knitting (or corking):
http://www.needlepointers.com/freeitemframe.asp?URL=http%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Ep
ellatuliptime%2Ecom%2Flessons%2Fstraw%2Fstrwcork%2Ehtml%23Supplies .
Hope it's helpful! ~Rue



"Pay no attention to the man behind the curtain."

-----Original Message-----
From: marji [mailto:marji@...]
Sent: Monday, March 10, 2003 3:29 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Help!! Need Knitting Mushroom
Instructions!


Hi! I don't mean to make this sound like a dire emergency or anything
like
that, but we have this knitting mushroom that we got years ago, and the
instructions to use it have vanished into the ether. Anyway, we want to

make a tail using our knitting mushroom, and I can't find instructions
to
use the thing on the web, and, well, I just can't seem to figure it out.

Then, I remembered my community of over 1000 people, one of whom may
know
how to use and knitting mushroom and would be willing to tell me. Liam
really needs a tail, and this would be the most fun way to make one.

Thanks! We're waiting anxiously by the computer, yarn in one hand,
knitting mushroom in the other.

Marji

messages.subject: Help!!  Need Knitting Mushroom Instructions!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi!  I don t mean to make this sound like a dire emergency or anything like that, but we have this knitting mushroom that we got years ago, and the
messages.messageBody:
Hi! I don't mean to make this sound like a dire emergency or anything like
that, but we have this knitting mushroom that we got years ago, and the
instructions to use it have vanished into the ether. Anyway, we want to
make a tail using our knitting mushroom, and I can't find instructions to
use the thing on the web, and, well, I just can't seem to figure it out.

Then, I remembered my community of over 1000 people, one of whom may know
how to use and knitting mushroom and would be willing to tell me. Liam
really needs a tail, and this would be the most fun way to make one.

Thanks! We're waiting anxiously by the computer, yarn in one hand,
knitting mushroom in the other.

Marji
